song_name: God Put a Smile upon Your Face
lyrics:

verse 2

and ah when you work it out im worse than you
yeah when you work it out i wanted to
and ah when you work out where to draw the line
your guess is as good as mine

dont ever say youre on your way down when

and put a smile upon your face ah yeah

chorus
and ah when you work it out im worse than you

and ah when you work out where to draw the line

as good as mine

dont ever say youre on your way down when
